attributes.additional_details:
Households should be able to claim around £15-£30 per week/per child, depending on the selected circumstances allocated by the government.
The limitation i propose is that no more than 3 children can be claimed for.
This does not mean parents cannot have more than 3 children it merely means that they should earn the responsibility to have more children by working. If only one parent is able to earn, households will still receive benefits for said children until they reach the age of adulthood, unless circumstances change in the mean time.
